projects.title: Namava
projects.bodyText:
- Implemented Modular Player, Network, and Persistent with 10% Passed Test Coverage.
 -  Collabraioned in led research, development, and implementation of modular software system design with TDD, modular structure, and clean architecture. Successfully increased productivity by 10% and decreased project bugs by 20% by hiring a great colleague for the iOS team.
 Implemented CI/CD with Fastlane and GitLab Runner to improve the test process, which enhanced time efficiency by 10% in each sprint.
